review: This is a good idea, but i'm really looking forward to amazon's.  You NEED a remote and a gui, the whole headless device just did not fit our family.  The casting device (my fire tablet) kept going to sleep and then we have to wait for it to wake up, get back on the network, just so we can pause.  Sounds trivial but you get a room full of people and it starts to get old quick.  I'm sure we are an edge case here so I'll give it 4 stars, its a fine product doing exactly what it advertised to do, just needs a hardware remote IMHO.
